definition: (honorific) to present/to give as a present
to offer (tribute)/to present respectfully (to superior, ancestor, deity etc)/to esteem/to revere/to believe in (a religion)/to wait upon/to accept orders (from superior)
to give as a present/to repel/to bestow an honorary title after death (old)
to give as a present/to repel/to bestow an honorary title after death (old)
(of a gift) to be a small token of one's feelings
return (a borrowed object) with thanks/decline (a gift) with thanks
lit. do not begrudge gems of wisdom (idiom, humble expr.); fig. Please give me your frank opinion./Your criticism will be most valuable.
lit. older brother/fig. fellow students who are successful in the imperial examinations
to write the title of a book on a label
